constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 23 (Monday, February 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BURCHETT:
H.R. 915.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 Clause 18
[Page H483]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: RAFT Act of 2021
